column4: is anybody here familiar on how to set-up a server under ubuntu
I need a wiz
what type of server
I don't know
we are starting a small company
and the money is not yet coming in
but I would like to set up a server so we can all connect to it
and work from our own homes
well you need to know what kind of data you are serving before going any futher
We are 4
are you looking for file sharing?
I was thinking of getting an opensource VPN
Yes file sharing but also maybe openproj
ticketing software so we can assign each other's tasks, etc
no Sylphid just for our own internal use
I don't even know how to install applications under linux
is it a big job?
I found some free VPN's we could use
but our resources at the moment are pretty scarce
If you are unsure of what you are doing with a system then it is unwise to store critical data on that system
right
do you think you might be interested in helping us out
keeping in mind we might be able to pay you in the future?
request for proposal
